General.Name: Hainan Yedao Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Hainan Yedao (Group) Co.,Ltd provides health wine, liquor, and food and beverage in China. Its health wine products include deer turtles wine, sea king wine, guitai, sauce, and other products. The company also offers coconut juice ecological drink and soft drinks. In addition, it is also involved in the development of real estate properties; and trading and investment activities. The company was founded in 1953 and is based in Haikou, China.
General.Address: No. 2, Yaogu Erheng Road, Haikou, China, 570311

2.Name: Mr. Peng  Yang
2.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
